shortDescription: Looks like the heat got too much for the EX-governor. Farah's been tracking a vehicle in which the sub-dermal transmitter has been activated. These transmitters are bio-linked and almost impossible to impersonate, so it must be him.
longDescription: The Irukjandi Company have played their hand and are now assisting August Rathbottom to escape the Capitol. Let's get him before he disappears again.

contractObjectiveList.title: Ambush Rathbottom's vehicle.
contractObjectiveList.description: The scum is trying to escape.

contractObjectiveList.title: Destroy the Convoy Guards.
contractObjectiveList.description: Send a message by not only destroy the convoy, but eliminte their escorts as well.

objectiveList.title: Get to the evac zone
objectiveList.description: The objective for the player units escaping and finishing the mission.

dialogueContent.words: Okay Commander, our goal is to disable his vehicle - which one? Well just shoot them all.
...Alright Mechwarriors, Lets get the vehicle and bug out before the guards get too frisky.
I'm getting a more small vehilce readings. Concentrate on the primary target and don't be distracted.
These 'Shell games' are a pain. Get in, disable the convoy, then we will extract at our designated location.
Excellent work Commander. While the Magastry Judicial System is as accomodating as possible but, Treason is still treason and it still brings the severest of punishment.
We have caught the perpetrator of the bombing but, someone has been organizing this from the shadows.
Agree Commander. Let's discuss this in detail somewhere more secure. In the meantime get some rest and ready up, you are not done yet.
We have a lock on the target vehicle. He should be to your front. Engage and destroy, Commander.
That's got it, keep firing on those targets until they are neutralized.
The guard units are dealt with, focus all fire on the convoy targets.
Warning, Commander! The target vehicles have begun to arrive at their destination, not much time left to destroy before we have to abort this mission.
One down. Keep engaging those threats and we'll be out of here.
The convoy is finished, now get what mechs you have to the extraction point and we'll pull you out. Move quickly.
Enemy Reinforcements, get ready for contact.
